definition[0]: an imaginary creature that looks like a small man
example[0]: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
definition[1]: a person who is a dwarf has not continued to grow to the normal height because of a medical condition. Many people think that this use is offensive.
definition[2]: a dwarf plant or animal is much smaller than the usual size
definition[3]: to be so big that other things are made to seem very small
example[2]: The cathedral is dwarfed by the surrounding skyscrapers.
